about.title: About Ashyo
about.des: Ashyo was established in 2022 in Tashkent.

nasiya.title: Installments
nasiya.des: Ashyo offers a convenient online payment plan for all household appliances.

paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentMethods.des: Pay in a convenient way: in-store, through Click or Payme.

garranty.title: Product Warranty
garranty.des: Learn everything about Ashyo's warranty and return policy.

help.title: Help
help.des: If you have questions, feel free to ask.

AboutUs.des1: Ashyo is a chain of electronics and household goods stores at market prices, offering a wide range of products and excellent service for over 2 months.
AboutUs.des2: Ashyo was established in 2022 in Tashkent. Today, it operates 26 stores across the capital and regions.
AboutUs.des3: You can purchase products through any convenient method: in-store or online. Installment plans are available. You only need a passport to register.
AboutUs.des4: For legal entities, bank transfer payment is available without additional fees.
